summary:
Microsoft Windows is a popular computer operating system (OS) made by Microsoft. It has different versions for various devices, like regular computers, servers, and small devices. The first Windows version came out in 1985, and it has grown a lot since then.

Windows is still the most used OS on desktop computers, but it's not the top overall when you include mobile devices, because Android is very popular. The latest Windows versions are Windows 11 for personal use and Windows Server 2022 for servers. Older versions, like Windows 10, still work and get support.
title: Microsoft Windows
